headline: Why American Express Stock Flew Higher on Friday
summary: Amex is seen as a proxy for stocks and the U.S. economy generally, and investors were clearly upbeat about both that day.  American Express (NYSE: AXP) stock rallied in late-session action on Friday to close the day higher in price.  While there was no direct news sending the share price up, general optimism on stocks and the economy helped lift Amex into positive territory.

headline: It’s a New Era for Capital One. Amex and Chase Are in Its Sights.
summary: Credit-card giant Capital One Financial now owns its own network, just as American Express does. What will it do with it?
